channel.title: My last question then im done XD
channel.description: Okay sorry if im annoying you out there lolz but All i need to know is how do i compress xml files or what do I use this might be easy for you but I dont know how to do this yet once i figure this out im done with all my questions :) thanks bye [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2008, 10:42:57 PM[/size][hr]lmfao sorry i wasnt thinking i asked the easiest question in the world lolz

item.title: My last question then im done XD
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Compression Tool —> http://uppit.com/HOUQGX

Get your Advert.xml once you edited it, place it in the ‘‘input’’ folder in the compression tool, hit compress all, and then it will be Advert.xml.gz in the ‘‘output’’ folder.

Now go back to your adverts.xml.gz folder, Delete evreything in there. Paste your new adverts.xml.gz that you just compressed, And extract it.

Then go back into Extras folder and delete the adverts.xml.gz there, replace it with your new adverts.xml.gz. Now restart your server and your done.

Read full topic
item.source: My last question then im done XD
